translation.en: -[woman] What are you eating? -[girl] Guess.
-[woman] I can't guess. -[girl in sing-song] Bet you can.
translation.zh:
‎-你猜
‎-我猜不到 ‎-你肯定能猜到
‎-我怎么猜得到？

translation.en: -[woman] How can I guess? -[girl] What day is it today?
translation.zh:
‎-你肯定能猜到
‎-我怎么猜得到？ ‎-今天是星期几？
‎-星期一

translation.en: [woman] Uh, it's Monday.
Oh. Sunday night's pizza night. -You're eating leftover pizza. -[girl giggles]
translation.zh:
‎星期天晚上吃披萨
‎所以你在吃昨晚剩下的

translation.en: Hey, make Dad go pick you out a pumpkin. It's that time of year again.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 让爸爸给你挑个南瓜 ‎又到万圣节了
‎整个街区都摆了南瓜装饰

translation.en: -They're all over. -[buzzer rings]
translation.zh:
‎又到万圣节了
‎整个街区都摆了南瓜装饰

translation.en: -[girl] Okay. -[woman] All right.
-Let me talk to Daddy. -[boy on intercom] Delivery.
translation.zh:
‎-叫爸爸来接电话 宝贝儿
‎-快递到了 ！

translation.en: -[girl] Daddy! -[buzzing] Daddy!
-[man] Hey, Slugger. -[woman] Hey.
[man] Tell me something good. -[woman] Something good.
-[woman] You were right about 101. -[man] How's that?
translation.zh:
‎-关于101号的情况 你说对了
‎-怎么说？

translation.en: [woman] But who moves in after a one-day paint job? [man] Well, you said it was in good shape.
translation.zh:
‎-谁会搬进一天就刷好了的房子啊？
‎-你说那房子的情况还不错啊

translation.en: [woman] I wish you were here.
-[man] Who does that help, saying that? -[woman] I can beat myself up if I want.
translation.zh:
‎-你这样说有什么用？
‎-只要我想 我可以臭骂自己一顿

translation.en: [man] Go for it. It's just an audience of one.
translation.zh: ‎你骂啊 ‎反正只有一个人围观 我不参与

translation.en: I'm not playing.
translation.zh: ‎反正只有一个人围观 我不参与

translation.en: [woman] Tell me to go outside.
[man] Why not make today the day you go outside?
translation.zh: ‎今天就是你走出大门的日子 好吗？

translation.en: So, what's the latest on the street?
What happened with the barking dog?
translation.zh: ‎那只经常狂吠的狗怎么样了？

translation.en: I thought we were going to talk about medications.
translation.zh: ‎我以为咱们该说下用药的事了

translation.en: We'll get there.
Would you like to take a seat?
Did it get squared away? The dog?
translation.zh:
‎-有人把它解决了吗？
‎-你说狗吗？

translation.en: I guess they started bringing him inside.
translation.zh: ‎我猜那家人开始让狗进屋了

translation.en: Did you end up calling 311? [chuckles] Oh, David talked me out of it.
translation.zh:
‎-后来你有没有打311？
‎-戴维劝我别打了

translation.en: It's more of a bother for him anyway. It's louder downstairs.
translation.zh:
‎反正对他的影响更大
‎住楼下觉得更吵

translation.en: So, I… must have talked to somebody.
translation.zh: ‎所以他应该是和什么人说过了

translation.en: Peaceful resolution.
This is the second session that you've done this.
translation.zh: ‎这已经是你第二次这样做了

translation.en: Ask about the neighborhood?
Does that make you uncomfortable?
I just don't know what you're goin' for.
translation.zh: ‎我只是不明白聊这些有什么用

translation.en: How's the prayer group?
[woman sighs] They're getting by.
[man] Do you think they know you're watching?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得他们知道你在观察吗？

translation.en: Is this really what you wanna talk about?
What about 101?
Looks like they already moved in.
What'd they pay?
Five-five. They were asking for six.
Who are they? The Russells.
Alistair and Jane. The broker says they're from Boston.
translation.zh:
‎丈夫叫阿利斯泰尔 妻子叫简
‎房屋中介说他们从波士顿来的

translation.en: Where's the money from?
She says he's a banker.
But there's practically nothing about them online.
translation.zh: ‎但是网上几乎查不到他们的任何信息

translation.en: I'm sure you'll figure it out.
What the fuck, Karl?
Curiosity is evidence of a decreased depression pattern.
translation.zh: ‎有好奇心说明抑郁程度降低

translation.en: People who snoop on their neighbors don't kill themselves? [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎所以窥探邻居的人不会自杀？

translation.en: Let's try this.
People who attempt suicide lose the right to joke about it.
translation.zh: ‎自杀未遂的人没有资格拿这个开玩笑

translation.en: I have a review with Dr. Kenner this week.
translation.zh: ‎这周我要和肯纳医生讨论一下

translation.en: Seeing as I've been unable to get you out the front door for the last 10 months,
translation.zh: ‎鉴于已经十个月了 我还是无法 ‎让你走出大门

translation.en: she's gonna wonder about the source of my optimism.
translation.zh: ‎她肯定想知道我凭什么还如此乐观

translation.en: Let's talk about the Elevan.
Now that you've curtailed the drinking,
how are you feeling about the side effects?
[man] I think you're reading into it.
[woman] I've been a shrink for 15 years. I know a threat when I hear one.
translation.zh:
‎我从事心理咨询15年了
‎一听就知道是威胁

translation.en: [man] He's on your side, Slugger. He's the reason you're still here.
translation.zh:
‎他是为了帮你 亲爱的
‎因为有他 你才还活着

translation.en: [woman] It's not really therapy if there's a knife at your back.
translation.zh:
‎如果我感觉有把刀抵在背后
‎这就不算是治疗

translation.en: [man] He comes every week, rain or shine. He's been there all the way through.
translation.zh: ‎他每周都来 不论晴雨 ‎他一直陪着你

translation.en: [woman] No, he's getting off on controlling me.
translation.zh: ‎不 他很享受对我的控制

translation.en: -[man] Really? -[woman] Yes. Did you read about Elevan?
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-真的 ‎你看过药物的说明吗？
‎仔细看下副作用说明

translation.en: Take a look at the side effects.
translation.zh:
‎你看过药物的说明吗？
‎仔细看下副作用说明

translation.en: [man] I know you're not supposed to drink on it.
translation.zh: ‎我知道在用药期间 你不应该喝酒

translation.en: [woman chuckles] They always say that.
Shit.
Yes?
[boy over speaker] I live, um, across the street there.
And?
My mom asked me to give you this.
I'm sorry…
I'm not prepared for visitors.
[boy] Oh, okay.
Do you have any ideas about what I should do with this?
translation.zh: ‎能告诉我这东西应该怎么办吗？

translation.en: You can just…
Push the door.
Hi. I'm Ethan. Yes.
Hi. Anna.
I'm from… across the street.
[Anna] Yes.
Sorry, I know you're not having, uh, visitors.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我知道你不便待客

translation.en: No, I'm… fine. You just surprised me, that's all.
translation.zh: ‎没事 我只是有些意外 没别的

translation.en: I'm not really a visitor so much.
I'm kind of, uh, more like a neighbor.
-I love lavender. -Heh.
My mom asked me to give it to you, like… days ago.
translation.zh: ‎我妈几天前就让我把这个送来

translation.en: I think that I'm the one supposed to be giving you a gift, eh…
translation.zh: ‎其实应该是我去给你们送个礼物

translation.en: Welcome to the neighborhood.
I like cats' tongues.
Sorry they're not fish fingers, buddy. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 猫咪 这不是小鱼干

translation.en: He likes you.
No.
How do you like your new house?
I miss the old one.
But we had to leave Boston.
translation.zh: ‎但是我们不得不离开波士顿

translation.en: Are those your… people?
Family? Yes.
Are they home?
No, they don't live here. We're separated.
translation.zh: ‎不 他们不住这里 我们分居了

translation.en: How old is she?
She's eight.
How old are you?
I'm gonna be 16 in six months.
Five months.
What do you do?
Oh, I'm a psychologist. I work with kids.
translation.zh: ‎我是心理医生 跟孩子打交道

translation.en: Really?
Really.
-That's interesting. -Why is that interesting?
translation.zh:
‎-真有意思
‎-为什么觉得有意思？

translation.en: I mean, it's more interesting than, like, working at Taco Bell.
translation.zh: ‎这比在塔可钟快餐店工作有意思

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Why would kids need a psychologist?
translation.zh: ‎小孩子为什么需要看心理医生？

translation.en: You really don't know why a kid would need a psychologist?
translation.zh:
‎你真的以为
‎小孩子不需要看心理医生？

translation.en: No, I mean, I'm sure they do, but I mean, like, why?
translation.zh:
‎不是的 我知道他们需要
‎只是不知道为什么

translation.en: Like, why do the kids who see you need a psychologist?
translation.zh:
‎那些来找你的孩子
‎为什么需要心理咨询？

translation.en: -All sorts of reasons. -School shootings or torturing someone?
translation.zh: ‎各种各样的原因 ‎比如遭遇校园枪击或者虐待他人？

translation.en: No, it doesn't have to be that dramatic. Some of them are depressed,
translation.zh:
‎比如遭遇校园枪击或者虐待他人？ ‎不一定是那么严重的事情 ‎他们有些觉得很压抑
‎有些陷入焦虑情绪

translation.en: some suffer from anxiety…
translation.zh:
‎他们有些觉得很压抑
‎有些陷入焦虑情绪

translation.en: some of them are… just having a hard time adjusting to a new place.
translation.zh: ‎有些只是不适应新的生活环境

translation.en: I can see your house from my room.
translation.zh: ‎我可以从我的房间里看到你家

translation.en: I mean… normally.
Right now, I can see… my dad from your house.
translation.zh: ‎现在我可以从你家看到我爸爸

translation.en: Are you okay?
[Ethan] Yeah.
Are you sure?
No, nothing, I just…
[softly] Hey.
You can talk to me.
I don't know anyone here.
You know me.
Not really.
Well, you could. Really?
We-we can be friends?
Sure.
Wow. You have a lot of movies.
Too many. That's what my husband says.
translation.zh: ‎太多了 我丈夫总这样说

translation.en: I thought you said you guys were separated.
He's still my husband, but you're right.
translation.zh: ‎但他还是我丈夫 不过你说得对

translation.en: You're welcome to borrow anything.
translation.zh: ‎这些影碟 你可以随便借

translation.en: Uh… My dad's kind of a tyrant with the TV.
-Goodbye, Punch. -[purrs]
I'm sorry I'm so allergic to you.
Why didn't you say something?
I don't wanna offend him.
He's not that sensitive.
Okay.
Okay, then.
-Enjoy. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-那就这样了
‎-观影愉快 ‎谢谢你

translation.en: See you around? Yeah, see you around.
…in some incredibly rustic community where good manners are unknown…
translation.zh:
‎…在某个不知礼仪为何物的
‎乡下社区…

translation.en: [man and Anna] …or you suffer from the common feminine delusion
translation.zh: ‎否则你就要忍受世人对女性的谬见

translation.en: that the mere fact of being a woman
exempts you from the rules of civilized conduct.
translation.zh: ‎仅仅因为你是个女人 ‎就可以不受文明行为规范的约束

translation.en: [Anna] Conduct.
-[man and Anna] Possibly both. -[laughing]
[woman on TV] Possibly. But here's what I wanted to show you…
translation.zh: ‎也许吧 但我想让你看到的是…

translation.en: -[buzzer ringing] -[kids chattering outside]
[man] I'm headed to Brooklyn.
-You need me to take care of anything? -Right. Uh, no. Thanks, I'm good.
translation.zh:
‎-有事需要我代办吗？
‎-好的 我没什么事 谢谢

translation.en: [man] Sure? Take out the garbage?
-Okay. As long as you're here. -[man] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 请你顺手扔一下
‎-好的

translation.en: You know, David, you've been my tenant for three months.
translation.zh: ‎戴维 你已经住进来三个月了

translation.en: You don't have to be so formal.
You can just come in through the basement stairs.
translation.zh: ‎直接从地下室的楼梯上来就好

translation.en: -No, I don't wanna startle ya. -[bottles clinking]
It's dark in here. Do the bulbs need changing?
translation.zh: ‎这儿太暗了 需要换灯泡吗？

translation.en: -I like it dim. -Okay.
Oh, Halloween tonight.
How do we do it without you going outside?
translation.zh: ‎你不出门 怎么过万圣节？

translation.en: You want me to get some candy?
I'm not going to give out candy.
I'm going to turn the lights out and pretend I'm not home.
translation.zh: ‎到时候我就把灯一关 假装没人在家

translation.en: We could just get a bowl of candy and leave it on the porch, like…
translation.zh: ‎其实我可以给你弄一碗糖果 ‎放在门廊上 就可以…

translation.en: Any kid would take it within a minute and then they'd take the bowl.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们会瞬间抢光 连碗都抱走

translation.en: Why don't we get a bowl of apples? 'Cause kids won't take apples.
translation.zh:
‎那我们放一盆子苹果呢？
‎因为小孩子不会吃苹果的

translation.en: Then what's the point?
Yeah. Okay.
Have a nice time.
Sure. Happy Halloween.
[woman on TV] Let your mind go back to your childhood.
-Was it happy? -[buzzer rings] -Whom did you know in your childhood? -[buzzer rings]
translation.zh:
‎感觉幸福吗？
‎你在童年时期都认识了谁？

translation.en: -I can't see by what. -[thud]
-[gasps] -It's no use.
[woman] You lived somewhere. -You had a mother. -[thud] You were loved, you had friends.
translation.zh:
‎回忆你住的地方 那时你母亲还在
‎有人爱你 你有朋友

translation.en: [man] Yes.
Get away from my house!
-[kid] Right there! -Hey! -[kid] Get her! -[gasps]
-This is my house. -[kid] Get her!
Hey.
You're gonna have to convince me I don't need to call an ambulance.
translation.zh: ‎你必须得说服我 让我不叫救护车

translation.en: [Anna] No, don't do that.
Okay, you know who you are? You know what day it is?
translation.zh:
‎你知道自己是谁吗？
‎今天是什么日子？

translation.en: Yeah, I'm Anna. It's Halloween.
translation.zh: ‎知道 我是安娜 今天是万圣节

translation.en: Okay, how many fingers?
[Anna] Three.
Okay. You're all right. You're gonna be all right. Just…
translation.zh: ‎你确实没事 你会好起来的

translation.en: breathing would be good.
I was headed across the street
when those little shits started chucking eggs,
and, oof, you went down hard.
You're Jane Russell.
What makes you say that?
[Anna] Your… your son came by. Ethan.
[Jane] Sit up in case you got a concussion.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 坐起来 好吗？以防你有脑震荡

translation.en: -[faucet runs] -[Jane] Jesus, it's dark in here. Do you faint a lot?
translation.zh:
‎天啊 这里也太暗了
‎你经常昏厥吗？

translation.en: I didn't faint.
I mean, it's… like fainting.
-[Jane pours drink] -I can't go outside.
Um… you didn't go outside.
-No, I get panic attacks. -Who doesn't?
Here. Have some of this brandy, please.
translation.zh: ‎谁不会呢？给 来杯酒压压惊

translation.en: Uh, I'm agoraphobic.
I can't go outside.
You're stuck inside this shitty house. Oh. [clicks tongue]
translation.zh: ‎所以你被困在了这间破房子里

translation.en: Oh, man. I'd hate to be stuck inside a house this shitty.
translation.zh:
‎天啊 我肯定受不了
‎被困在这么糟糕的房子里

translation.en: Is that your husband coming home?
It's my tenant.
He lives in the basement.
So, um, what do you do all day? I mean, do you work?
translation.zh:
‎那你每天都做些什么？
‎我是说 你有工作吗？

translation.en: Oh, God, I'm so fucking nosy.
I… I should just go. Um--
-Do you want me to go? -No.
No, it's… It's all right. I'm fine.
translation.zh: ‎别走 没关系 我没事

translation.en: I… counsel people.
You counsel people?
-Mm-hmm. -Oh, you're a shrink.
Oh! [chuckles] That's a twist.
You married?
-Separated. -Ah.
And kids?
My daughter Olivia is with her father.
translation.zh: ‎我女儿奥莉维亚和她爸爸住一起

translation.en: Oh, that's tough.
Yeah.
Yeah. Separated from your kid, that's really tough.
translation.zh: ‎对 要和孩子分开 那真的很难受吧

translation.en: I talk to them every day.
Yeah, it's just… It's--
It's not the same as them being here, though, is it?
translation.zh:
‎这和他们就在身边
‎还是不一样 对吧？

translation.en: Take another drink, please.
-Do you wanna go outside? -You know, I have a shrink of my own.
translation.zh:
‎-你想到外面去吗？
‎-我其实有个专门的心理医生

translation.en: [laughing] Okay. Okay. I get it. I get it.
translation.zh: ‎好 我明白了 好的 抱歉

translation.en: All right, sorry. That sounds very wise.
translation.zh:
‎好 我明白了 好的 抱歉 ‎-看心理医生听起来很明智
‎-是的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-看心理医生听起来很明智
‎-是的

translation.en: I get it. [chuckles]
Yeah.
We've been trying to get me to go outside using an umbrella.
translation.zh: ‎我们一直想试试打着伞能不能走出去

translation.en: I haven't… been able to do it yet.
You will. You will. You'll figure it out.
[Jane] Notice I'm not asking what made you this way.
translation.zh:
‎注意 我不是要打听
‎你为什么会成这样

translation.en: [Anna] What way? Agoraphobic.
I have anxiety. I have… an anxiety disorder.
translation.zh: ‎我有焦虑症 焦虑性障碍

translation.en: -Punch. [clicking tongue] Punch. -So, um…
That's what all these pills are for?
translation.zh: ‎天啊 所以你才要吃这些药吗？

translation.en: So, what does… what does this one do? This, uh, pink one.
translation.zh: ‎这一瓶有什么用？粉红色这瓶…

translation.en: Uh, that's Inderal.
Ah. Beta blocker. How do you know that?
Um, 'cause it says so on the bottle.
Pretty sure you're not supposed to be… taking these with alcohol.
translation.zh: ‎说真的 你在用药期间不应该喝酒

translation.en: Thank you for the candle.
Ethan brought it by. Thanks.
Oh. Wow, okay, subject change.
I think I hurt my neck.
-[both chuckle] -He's a nice boy.
-Look. -Oh, what a cutie.
-Yeah. -Yeah. He's my guy. My little baby guy.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 他是我的小小男子汉

translation.en: You know, when you have a kid, you say, "He's my kid, my guy,"
translation.zh:
‎有了孩子以后
‎你会说：“这是我孩子 我儿子”

translation.en: Like he's yours, like he belongs to you.
translation.zh: ‎就好像他是你的 归你所有

translation.en: -That's not really how it feels. -You belong to them.
translation.zh:
‎但其实根本不是这回事 ‎-你归他们所有
‎-对

translation.en: Right.
Right. You belong to them. And maybe you never belonged to anybody before.
translation.zh:
‎非常对 你归你的孩子们所有
‎也许从前你没觉得自己属于谁

translation.en: I mean, maybe, maybe you thought you belonged to your parents.
translation.zh:
‎也许你曾以为你是属于父母的
‎后来你长大离开了父母

translation.en: You grew out of that. You certainly didn't belong to your husband.
translation.zh:
‎也许你曾以为你是属于父母的
‎后来你长大离开了父母 ‎显然你也不属于丈夫

translation.en: Then this kid comes along, and he's just got you.
translation.zh:
‎可是当你有了孩子
‎他就牢牢拴住了你

translation.en: [laughs] I don't have to tell you that.
I like your earrings.
Oh. Oh, thanks, yeah. A gift. They're a gift from an old boyfriend.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢 是啊 别人送的
‎是前男友送我的

translation.en: Does your husband mind?
I doubt he knows.
He has trust issues.
Oh, why is that?
-Oh, I don't know. -You don't know? Mmm.
No. Come on, no, no. I don't know. I don't know. -No, it's… [clears throat] -Hmm.
[sucks teeth] Who knows why he has them? Um…
translation.zh: ‎天知道他为什么不相信别人？

translation.en: He's a good guy, he's a good father. He's just, you know…
translation.zh:
‎他是个好人 是个好父亲
‎但是他 你知道…

translation.en: -He's tight. -[Anna] Mm. Controlling, and like…
translation.zh: ‎他紧张易怒 控制欲很强 而且…

translation.en: I have my own issues, but I work through them and…
translation.zh: ‎我自己也有心理障碍 ‎但是我会调节 我可以应对那些情绪

translation.en: I can handle them.
translation.zh: ‎但是我会调节 我可以应对那些情绪

translation.en: Maybe sometimes I have to… get in between them and I--
translation.zh:
‎也许有时候 我还是会陷入焦虑
‎而且我…

translation.en: I worry about Ethan, 'cause…
he's sensitive.
Family's… complicated.
Why is your family complicated?
-[Jane] Look. -Oh, wow! That's amazing!
translation.zh:
‎你看 ‎-画得真好！
‎-是吧！简拉塞尔的原创作品

translation.en: Yeah. Jane Russell original.
translation.zh:
‎-画得真好！
‎-是吧！简拉塞尔的原创作品

translation.en: -See how I changed the subject on you? -I did.
translation.zh:

-Are you going through my mail? -[Anna] I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
‎你在偷看我的信件吗？ ‎-抱歉
‎-不是吧

translation.en: -[David] Unreal. -I-- I-- I knocked.
I just… I needed to ask you a question.
Ask me what? Huh? Here I am, what's your question?
translation.zh:
‎问我什么？
‎我在这儿呢 有什么问题？

translation.en: Jane.
Have you met her? Have you met the woman across the street?
translation.zh:
‎你见过她吗？
‎你见过住在街对面的那个女人吗？

translation.en: -Jane? -Jane Russell?
-No. -You worked with them.
I worked for him. For Mr. Russell. I never met his wife.
translation.zh:
‎我只给拉塞尔先生干过活儿
‎从没见过他妻子

translation.en: What am I, your messenger now?
translation.zh: ‎我现在成了你的传话筒了吗？

translation.en: Pick up the phone and call him!
translation.zh: ‎拿起电话给他打过去 安娜！

translation.en: Better yet, why don't you take a stroll across the street! -No? -[door slams]
translation.zh:
‎或者干脆走过那条街去找他！
‎不要吗？

translation.en: You seem really upset. Why would that be, Anna?
translation.zh:
‎-你看起来非常烦躁
‎-你觉得是为什么呢 安娜？

translation.en: Yes, I have a parole problem.
translation.zh: ‎对 我为假释的事烦着呢

translation.en: Huh? You wanna read it? Here you go.
-No, it was on the floor. -I'm in violation.
translation.zh:
‎-我只是把信捡起来
‎-我犯了法

translation.en: I'm supposed to be in Springfield, Massachusetts.
translation.zh: ‎我本该在马萨诸塞的斯普林菲尔德市

translation.en: -Okay. -No, not okay!
It was a bar fight.
I was in the wrong place at the wrong time and I got fucking jumped and I reacted!
translation.zh:
‎我只是碰巧撞上了他们
‎冷不防被人揍了 于是我就反击了！

translation.en: -God! -[gasps]
I shouldn't have come down here.
Look, I'm working on it.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我正在想办法解决

translation.en: I'm going to Connecticut to see a guy about it.
translation.zh: ‎今晚要去康涅狄格 明早去见一个人

translation.en: Okay. I'm dealing with it.
translation.zh:
‎-好的
‎-我正在想办法摆平这事儿

translation.en: Why don't we pretend this never happened?
translation.zh: ‎要不咱们假装这件事没有发生过？

translation.en: We're cool, right?
[softly] Yeah.
Just give me a couple of days to get on top of it.
translation.zh: ‎再给我几天时间 我会摆平的

translation.en: [man] David, come on, let's go!
[David] Man, we need to talk about it.
[woman] I think you know who I am.
Stop watching our house or I'll call the police.
translation.zh: ‎不要再偷窥我家了 不然我会报警

translation.en: [Anna] Punch?
Punch?
David?
Punch?
Hey! What are you doing down here?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你跑这下面来干什么？

translation.en: Poor guy, you've been down here all night.
translation.zh: ‎可怜的猫咪 你一整晚都在下面？

translation.en: How did you get down here?
[Anna] I like your earrings. Does your husband mind?
translation.zh:
‎我喜欢你的耳环 ‎谢谢 是啊 别人送的
‎是前男友送我的

translation.en: [Jane] I doubt he knows. A gift from an old boyfriend.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢 是啊 别人送的
‎是前男友送我的

translation.en: -[man] So now you don't wanna talk. -[Anna] I'm busy.
translation.zh:
‎-你现在又不想聊了吗？
‎-我很忙

translation.en: -[man] If I can't say what I think… -[Anna] I'm not delusional.
translation.zh:
‎-如果我不能表达真实想法…
‎-我没有妄想症状

translation.en: [man] Break it down. First it's the boy, then that murder across the street.
translation.zh:
‎你好好分析一下 亲爱的 ‎首先是那个孩子
‎然后是街对面的凶杀案

translation.en: Now there's another woman in Boston…
translation.zh: ‎现在是波士顿的另一个女人

translation.en: an earring, and fucking David, who you always liked.
translation.zh:
‎一枚耳环
‎还有你一直觉得还不错的戴维…

translation.en: -[Anna] You done? -[man] With you at the center…
-[Anna] Don't. -…on all those damn pills.
-Fuck off! -[man] There's nothing here for you.
translation.zh: ‎不要说了 ‎这些事与你无关 你很清楚

translation.en: You know it. You've got to move on.
translation.zh:
‎这些事与你无关 你很清楚 ‎-你该放下了
‎-我不能

translation.en: [Anna] I don't know, I'm just not made that way.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么不能？
‎-我不知道 我就是不忍心不管

translation.en: I wish to God I could, believe me, but I can't.
translation.zh:
‎我也希望我能放手
‎相信我 但我做不到

translation.en: Everyone else can move on. I can't.
translation.zh: ‎别人都能放下 向前看 可我不行

translation.en: Where's your mother?
Stop it. Stop.
Ethan? Why are you lying to me?
Can't scream at me on the street.
translation.zh:
‎-我在街上 你别冲我喊
‎-你不说 我也帮不了你…

translation.en: -I can't help you if you don't tell. -You never met my mother!
translation.zh:
‎-我在街上 你别冲我喊
‎-你不说 我也帮不了你… ‎-你没见过我妈
‎-那时候你说谎了 你知道的

translation.en: You were lying and you know it.
translation.zh:
‎-你没见过我妈
‎-那时候你说谎了 你知道的

translation.en: -You're just confused. -No, I know what I saw.
translation.zh:
‎-你搞错了
‎-没有 我知道我看到了什么

translation.en: You don't. You're just wrong. I know what I saw!
translation.zh:
‎-你不知道 你搞错了
‎-我知道我看到了什么

translation.en: -You don't! You're wrong! -We talked about you.
translation.zh:
‎-你不知道 你搞错了！
‎-我们聊到了你

translation.en: -She told me about you! -Don't do this to me!
translation.zh:
‎-你妈说起过你！
‎-你别再这样了！

translation.en: Why are you lying for him?!
Ethan.
Why are you protecting him?
I can't tell you.
-[yelps] -[Alistair] Go home!
You cannot slap that boy.
I've put up with a lot, Mrs. Fox, all of us have, but this--
translation.zh:
‎我已经忍让很多了
‎福克斯女士 我们都容忍你 ‎但你的行为要适可而止！

translation.en: This stops now.
Your relationship with Ethan, it's inappropriate.
He's a young man! He's a…
He's a boy! He's 15-and-a-half and you're a mature woman!
translation.zh:
‎他是个孩子！才15岁半
‎你是个成年的女人

translation.en: And of course, you're completely out of your goddamn mind!
translation.zh: ‎不过当然了 你已经彻底疯了！

translation.en: [nervously] I'll call the police! Go. Go ahead.
Go ahead. I'm sure they'd love hearing from you.
translation.zh: ‎报警啊 他们肯定愿意听你的话

translation.en: A-- A drunken, shut-in, pill-popping cat lady!
translation.zh:
‎你这个喝酒嗑药 从不出门
‎只和猫住的疯女人

translation.en: You…
You're fucking with the wrong family.
-Stay away from my son! -[whimpering]
Please!
There you are. That's your little kitty.
translation.zh: ‎这是你 这是你的小猫咪

translation.en: And there's her little nose. And all the beautiful flowers.
translation.zh: ‎这是你的小鼻子和这些美丽的花朵

translation.en: It's beautiful. It's hopeful.
Hey. You got something in your foot, huh?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你的脚上沾东西了吗？

translation.en: -[purring] -You got something in there?
-Punch, what is it? Huh? -[Punch meows]
It's okay.
You don't have any idea who could've sent you this?
translation.zh: ‎你完全想不到这会是谁发的吗？

translation.en: No, the only person who has a key is my tenant, David.
translation.zh: ‎想不到 只有我的租户戴维有钥匙

translation.en: Yeah, where is he? I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎-好的 那他在哪儿？
‎-我不知道

translation.en: -Are you having problems with David? -No. I mean, no. I…
translation.zh:
‎你和戴维之间有矛盾吗？ ‎-没有 应该没 我…
‎-上面没发现

translation.en: -[Norelli] Nothing up here. -You see, coast is clear.
translation.zh:
‎-没有 应该没 我…
‎-上面没发现 ‎你看 警报解除

translation.en: -Can you track the email? -Track it?
-Or trace it? Whatever. -You can't track a Gmail account.
translation.zh:
‎-查查来源？
‎-谷歌邮箱无法追踪

translation.en: -You could've sent this to yourself. -I'm sleeping.
translation.zh:
‎可能是你自己发给自己的 ‎-我睡着了
‎-也许你是假装睡着

translation.en: -Or you wanted to look asleep. -[Anna] I'm asleep.
translation.zh:
‎-我睡着了
‎-也许你是假装睡着 ‎我真的睡着了 你什么意思？

translation.en: -What the hell? -[buzzer rings]
translation.zh: ‎我真的睡着了 你什么意思？

translation.en: Dr. Fox, there is no sign that anyone has been here, okay? Nothing is missing.
translation.zh:
‎福克斯医生 你家真的
‎没有外人闯入的痕迹 好吗？ ‎-什么都没丢
‎-门窗看起来都没问题

translation.en: -[Norelli] Doors and windows look okay. -Someone has been in my house.
translation.zh:
‎-什么都没丢
‎-门窗看起来都没问题 ‎真的有人进来过 我已经提供了证据

translation.en: -I have given you proof. -[door opens]
translation.zh: ‎真的有人进来过 我已经提供了证据

translation.en: [Alistair] She called my office in Boston!
translation.zh:
‎她给我们波士顿办事处打电话了
‎你们知道吗？

translation.en: -Did you know that? She's called my house! -[Little] Damn it! Mr. Russell.
translation.zh:
‎她给我们波士顿办事处打电话了
‎你们知道吗？ ‎-她给我家打电话了！
‎-拉塞尔先生 冷静

translation.en: Why were you fired? -She spies on our house! -All right.
translation.zh:
‎-你为什么被解雇？
‎-她用相机偷窥我家！

translation.en: She lured my son into her home! He is abusive.
translation.zh:
‎-她把我儿子诱拐到家里！
‎-那孩子受了虐待

translation.en: She is harassing my son. She is harassing my-- He hit his son. I saw him hit his son.
translation.zh:
‎-她骚扰我儿子
‎-他打了他儿子 我亲眼看到的

translation.en: She's delusional.
Ethan told me, Jane told me, I saw him do it.
translation.zh:
‎伊森告诉我了 简也告诉我了
‎我看到他家暴了

translation.en: -Um… -She is Jane!
You are a drunk and a drug addict and you made it all up!
translation.zh:
‎你是个酒鬼、瘾君子
‎这都是你编出来的！

translation.en: You almost had me believing that and then I found this.
translation.zh:
‎你们差点让我信了
‎但是我发现了这个！

translation.en: What's this? This is a picture that your wife drew and signed.
translation.zh:
‎-这是什么？
‎-这是你妻子画的 还有她的署名

translation.en: And you call me delusional, you motherfucker.
translation.zh: ‎看你还敢说我有幻觉 你这王八蛋

translation.en: -[Norelli] Hey, hey! -It's you.
She was here.
-That proves it. -[Alistair] That doesn't prove anything.
translation.zh: ‎画就是证据 ‎这什么也证明不了

translation.en: That proves you're out of your mind.
What's happening?
Door was open.
-Who are you? -[David] I live downstairs.
It's my tenant. That's David.
-[Norelli] Got a last name, David? -No. Just David. Like Sting.
translation.zh: ‎那你姓什么 戴维？ ‎没有 就叫戴维 就是我的艺名

translation.en: It's Winters. His last name is Winters.
It's just Winter, actually. Singular.
Where were you last night, Mr. Winters?
translation.zh: ‎昨天夜里你在哪儿 温特斯先生？

translation.en: In Connecticut. On a job. Why?
translation.zh:
‎在康涅狄格州
‎工作上的事 怎么了？

translation.en: Somebody took a photo of Dr. Fox in her sleep…
translation.zh:
‎有人在夜里2点
‎趁福克斯女士睡着拍了她的照片

translation.en: around 2:00 a.m. and then e-mailed it to her.
translation.zh:
‎有人在夜里2点
‎趁福克斯女士睡着拍了她的照片 ‎然后把照片用邮件发给她

translation.en: Someone broke in? How do we know it was last night?
translation.zh:
‎-有人闯进来了吗？
‎-怎么知道是昨晚的事？

translation.en: Can anyone confirm you were in Connecticut last night?
translation.zh: ‎有人能证明你昨晚在康涅狄格吗？

translation.en: Yeah. The lady I was with.
translation.zh: ‎有 有位女士和我在一起

translation.en: I'm gonna need her number.
You can call her. Her name is Elizabeth.
translation.zh: ‎可以打电话问她 她叫伊丽莎白

translation.en: Dr. Fox says she saw a woman assaulted in Mr. Russell's house.
translation.zh:
‎福克斯医生说她目击
‎一名女子在拉塞尔先生家中遇害

translation.en: You know anything about that?
-No. -Have you ever met Mrs. Russell?
translation.zh:
‎-不知道
‎-你见过拉塞尔夫人吗？

translation.en: No.
Her earring is beside your bed on your nightstand, that little rose.
translation.zh: ‎她的耳环就在你的床头柜上 ‎小玫瑰花形的 简拉塞尔的耳环

translation.en: Jane Russell's earring.
translation.zh: ‎小玫瑰花形的 简拉塞尔的耳环

translation.en: What were you doing in your tenant's bedroom?
She has some serious privacy issues.
translation.zh: ‎她有严重的问题 喜欢窥探他人隐私

translation.en: Well… how do you do?
That earring belongs to a woman I know.
translation.zh: ‎那个耳环是一个我认识的女人的

translation.en: And who is that woman?
Her name is Katherine. She spent the night here last week.
translation.zh: ‎她叫凯瑟琳 上周她来这里住了一晚

translation.en: You took a box cutter from me.
You loaned it to me.
Checks out. He was in Darien last night.
translation.zh:
‎查到了
‎昨晚他在康涅狄格州的达里恩

translation.en: He was in prison for assault.
He was in prison. He shouldn't be in New York.
translation.zh: ‎他进了监狱 不应该出现在纽约

translation.en: He's been in her house. He must have met her.
translation.zh: ‎他去过拉塞尔家 ‎一定见过她

translation.en: Her earring is beside his bed and he borrowed a knife from me,
translation.zh: ‎她的耳环就在他的床边 ‎他还找我借了一把刀 他蹲过监狱

translation.en: and he's been in prison.
translation.zh: ‎他还找我借了一把刀 他蹲过监狱

translation.en: And he was fired from his job.
His assistant died.
He threatened me. In my home.
translation.zh: ‎他还威胁过我 就在我家

translation.en: He beats his child.
I'm a child psychologist.
I know how to identify a child who's in danger, who's being abused.
translation.zh:
‎我知道如何辨别
‎受到虐待、处境危险的孩子

translation.en: And I saw Alistair slap Ethan in my home yesterday.
translation.zh:
‎昨天在我家 我亲眼看到
‎阿利斯泰尔扇了伊森一耳光

translation.en: Wait-- W--
Yes, yes. Yesterday.
I see…
I see the way that you're all looking at me.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你们都在用什么样的眼光看我

translation.en: I'm not crazy.
I'm not hallucinating. Do I seem unreasonable?
translation.zh:
‎这些不是我的幻觉
‎我看起来不可理喻吗？

translation.en: I have evidence.
There was that picture that Jane drew and she signed,
translation.zh: ‎有简亲手画的画 还署了名

translation.en: and there's a photograph that somebody took of me while I was sleeping.
translation.zh: ‎有那张在我睡着以后被人偷拍的照片

translation.en: Look, it doesn't matter what you think about me,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我不在乎你们怎么看我

translation.en: if you approve of me, if you think that I'm reliable.
translation.zh:
‎同不同意我的看法
‎是否认为我值得信任

translation.en: There is a boy in danger in that house.
translation.zh: ‎但那座房子里真的有个孩子处境危险

translation.en: Just help him, please.
You're a father.
I would think that you would want to help a child.
translation.zh: ‎我想你应该很愿意救助这个孩子

translation.en: If my husband were here…
he would help.
He would believe me.
[Norelli] Dr. Fox, your family is dead.
translation.zh: ‎福克斯医生 你的家人已经死了

translation.en: I don't know how you can live with yourself
translation.zh: ‎我真不知道如果孩子出了什么事

translation.en: if you let something happen to a child.
[Norelli] I'm sorry, but your family is dead.
translation.zh: ‎我很遗憾 但是你的家人已经死了

translation.en: Do you like the mountains, Livy?
[Olivia] They look like a giant's bed.
Like a giant, sleeping under a white blanket.
translation.zh: ‎好像一个巨人 盖着白毯子睡着了

translation.en: [Anna] You're gonna ski in those tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎明天你就可以去山上滑雪了

translation.en: That one looks like a horse.
What would you name a horse if we got one?
translation.zh:
‎如果我们有匹马
‎你想给它取什么名字？

translation.en: I'd call him Vixen.
A vixen is a fox.
It's a girl fox, sweetheart.
[Olivia] What would you call a horse, Mommy?
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 那你要给小马取什么名字？

translation.en: "Of course, of course."
It's an old TV show.
translation.zh: ‎这是一部很老的电视剧里的

translation.en: I can't do it this way.
Do what?
Do what?
This.
This happy family vacation.
You and I spoke in painful detail
translation.zh: ‎这件事我们已经详细讨论过了

translation.en: and I thought that we agreed that we would not ruin Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎我以为双方已经达成一致
‎不会破环圣诞节的气氛

translation.en: And I can't do it anymore. I can't.
translation.zh: ‎我现在装不下去了 做不到

translation.en: The acting is foolish. It doesn't dignify our daughter.
translation.zh:
‎强颜欢笑太愚蠢了
‎这并不是尊重孩子

translation.en: You don't care if she gets upset?
translation.zh: ‎你不担心她为此伤心难过吗？

translation.en: She should be upset. It's upsetting.
translation.zh:
‎她应该感到难过
‎这件事本来就令人难过

translation.en: Well, don't blame me if she's scarred for life.
translation.zh: ‎如果她留下心理创伤可别怪我

translation.en: I do blame you. You're to blame.
translation.zh: ‎就应该怪你 本来就是你的错

translation.en: The one fucking the other person is to blame.
You wanna answer it?
I bet that's him.
I'll answer it.
-Stop it! -Stop it!
-[man] Anna! -[gasps]
I'm sorry, but… your family is dead.
translation.zh: ‎我很遗憾 但是你的家人已经死了

translation.en: Ed? Ed! [exclaims]
Livy?
Livy?
[sniffles] Olivia?
Come on, baby. [sniffles]
I got you. Come on.
Olivia.
Wake up. [sniffling] Wake up!
-[call failure tone] -[signal beeping]
[Little] I talked to your doctor, Dr. Landy.
translation.zh: ‎我和你的医生聊过 也就是兰迪医生

translation.en: And you have had a hell of a time.
And I think you actually believe that you met this lady
translation.zh: ‎我认为你相信自己见过这位女士

translation.en: just like how you believe you're talking to your family.
translation.zh:
‎就和你相信
‎自己仍与家人保持通话一样

translation.en: Your doctor said that your meds can cause hallucinations.
translation.zh: ‎你的医生说 你的药物会导致幻觉

translation.en: Maybe that's okay by you.
[scoffs] I know it'd be okay by me.
-Jane Russell… -Yeah, she, uh… -She checks out. -[Jane 2 sighs]
This lady here, from 101…
she is who she says she is.
She is Jane Russell.
-Now, as for what you saw that night-- -Um…
translation.zh:
‎-至于那天晚上你看到的事情…
‎-十…

translation.en: I'm so, so sorry.
Of course. Your wife is who she says she is.
translation.zh: ‎不用说了 你的妻子自称是谁就是谁

translation.en: Of course she is.
Of course… you are.
I'm really sorry that I involved you in…
translation.zh: ‎真抱歉我把你们牵扯进这一切

translation.en: all of this.
translation.zh: ‎真抱歉我把你们牵扯进这一切 ‎我…

translation.en: I'm so sorry that I mixed Ethan up in this.
I don't… I don't know…
what you must think.
All of you.
I understand…
if you want to recommend…
supervision.
[Karl] I'm listening.
I've been slipping.
Slipping on my meds.
Drinking.
Getting into a really…
dark frame of mind and I'm not sharing that with you.
translation.zh: ‎阴郁的情绪 并且没有告诉你

translation.en: [Karl] That's a hard thing to admit.
And to hear.
I don't think that the Elevan is good for me. [chuckles softly]
translation.zh: ‎我觉得服用药物对我并不好

translation.en: -[laughs] No. -Not if you're hallucinating, no.
translation.zh:
‎-不好
‎-你都出现幻觉了 不行

translation.en: I wouldn't think, no, no. [sniffles]
And there's some mania… too.
I just really needed to be at the center of something.
I needed a wake-up call.
You got very lucky with that detective.
You realize how this could've gone differently.
translation.zh:
‎你要知道 要不是他
‎情况会大不相同

translation.en: I just wanna turn it around.
I had no idea about David.
Well, that was a mess.
-Is he here? -No, no.
translation.zh:
‎-那家伙也一团糟
‎-他在吗？ ‎不 他…今天下午会过来…

translation.en: He's… gonna come back this afternoon and…
pick up the last of his stuff.
Which leaves you here alone.
You don't think it's paranoid if I wanna change the locks, do you?
translation.zh:
‎如果我想把锁都换掉
‎你不会觉得我疑神疑鬼吧？

translation.en: There's gonna have to be somebody here.
And then you and I are gonna go back to three sessions a week.
translation.zh: ‎接下来我们要恢复每周三次治疗

translation.en: Okay.
I'm Anna Fox.
Uh, today is, um…
Monday. November 6th.
And I'm making this video…
[whispers] Making…
I'm Anna Fox, and I'm at 104…
translation.zh:
‎我是安娜福克斯 ‎我住在纽约曼哈顿
‎121街西区104号

translation.en: West 121st Street in Manhattan, New York.
translation.zh:
‎我住在纽约曼哈顿
‎121街西区104号

translation.en: And I am, uh, making this video…
as my final will and testament.
Randy Turo, that's a lawyer.
He has a written will…
that Ed and I did together.
After, um… Olivia was born.
And I'm not gonna be… making any, like, super-significant changes…
translation.zh:
‎现在我并不打算
‎对遗嘱做很大的改动…

translation.en: Super… Super…
-Fuck, really? -[camera beeps]
The point of me doing this is that there's no, um…
translation.zh: ‎我这么做的目的是为了避免…

translation.en: confusion…
about, um, my soundness of mind.
My state of mind.
I-- I-- I especially wanna make sure that, um…
that you know that David Winters has absolutely nothing to do with my death.
translation.zh: ‎戴维温特斯与我的死毫无关系

translation.en: In fact, I'm waiting for him to come…
to come and to get his stuff…
so that I can, um…
go through with it.
Go through with it… [scoffs]
I just wish I could be forgiven.
I really… wish I could just be forgiven.
I want to go back.
I want to do it over.
I want to do it different.
And I can't.
And I can't.
[shouts] I can't!
-[Anna] Punch. -[camera clicks]
-Punch. Punch. -[camera clicking]
[whispering] Okay.
Hello?
Hello?
[David] Sorry.
Tried to call. I just need to get my umbrella and my gloves.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉！我打过电话 ‎我是来拿雨伞和手套的

translation.en: [Anna] Can you come up? Uh, just for a moment.
[David] I'm soaking wet.
I had a long day and it's not about to end soon.
translation.zh: ‎我今天倒霉透了 没完没了的麻烦

translation.en: [Anna] Please. It'll just take a minute.
translation.zh: ‎拜托了 就耽误你一分钟

translation.en: Thank you. For what?
I wanna show you… a picture.
The face in the wine glass.
Yeah, I see it.
That is the woman that I saw murdered.
She said that her name was Jane Russell!
Her name is Katie.
What?
Ethan, the son…
she is the birth mother.
You spent the night with her.
Wednesday. One night.
She was a total disaster. Why do you think I bailed?
translation.zh:
‎她是个大麻烦
‎你以为我在逃避什么？

translation.en: I spent the night on a couch in Astoria on Thursday night
translation.zh:
‎星期四我跑去阿斯托利亚
‎在沙发上睡了一晚

translation.en: just so I don't have to run into her again.
She ran away on him when she was eight months pregnant.
translation.zh: ‎她怀孕八个月时离开了他 音信全无

translation.en: Disappeared. Alistair spent two years chasing her down
translation.zh: ‎阿利斯泰尔花了两年时间到处找她

translation.en: and found her in some Oregon meth commune. He took the boy, she went to prison.
translation.zh:
‎最后在俄勒冈发现她跟着一伙人吸毒
‎他带走了孩子 她进了监狱

translation.en: -See how I changed the subject on you? -I did.
translation.zh:
‎-看到没？我也成功转换了话题
‎-发现了

translation.en: You don't know who you're fooling with. [laughing]
translation.zh: ‎你可不知道你是在和谁玩儿呢

translation.en: They told you this?
translation.zh:
‎-这是他们告诉你的？
‎-是她说的

translation.en: She did. She wouldn't shut up.
translation.zh:
‎-这是他们告诉你的？
‎-是她说的 ‎她一开口就说个不停

translation.en: They've been hiding from her for years. She found out they were living in Boston.
translation.zh:
‎拉塞尔一家躲了她好多年了 ‎她发现他们搬到了波士顿
‎他一直给她钱 让她走

translation.en: He's been paying her to stay away.
translation.zh:
‎她发现他们搬到了波士顿
‎他一直给她钱 让她走

translation.en: Why did she tell me her name is Jane Russell?
translation.zh: ‎那她为什么说自己是简拉塞尔？

translation.en: You're Jane Russell. You're Jane Russell.
What makes you say that?
[Anna] Your son came by. Ethan.
I saw her murdered.
Whatever you say, Anna.
Yeah.
I showed you… the picture.
Yeah, looking very much alive.
She's real!
And I need you to go to the police with me.
No. No, no.
David! You can't just run away from this!
translation.zh: ‎戴维 你不能对这件事不管不顾

translation.en: [David] Watch me. Oh, shit! Please, David!
translation.zh:
‎-我就不管了
‎-见鬼 求你了 戴维

translation.en: -[glass shatters] -Oh, shit!
David?
Oh, my God!
You know what's so great about this?
Everyone thinks I'm in New Hampshire right now.
translation.zh: ‎就是大家都以为我去了新罕布什尔

translation.en: They call it a wilderness program but it's really a prison.
translation.zh:
‎他们说的荒野训练营
‎其实就是把你关起来

translation.en: I was supposed to go last month but they had a fire or something. [chuckles softly]
translation.zh:
‎我本来上个月就要去的
‎但是好像发生了火灾什么的

translation.en: We never had a chance to say goodbye.
David!
The trick is to run away before you get there.
translation.zh: ‎关键就是要在到达目的地之前逃走

translation.en: What did you do? [loudly] David!
He's dead. You killed him.
-No. What? -It's your knife.
translation.zh:
‎不 什么？ ‎这是你的刀 在你家里
‎这里只有你们俩

translation.en: Your house. Just the two of you.
translation.zh:
‎这是你的刀 在你家里
‎这里只有你们俩

translation.en: What did you do? He deserved it.
He slept with my mom and got her all pissed off. And then threw her out.
translation.zh:
‎他睡了我妈妈 还惹她生气
‎最后又把她赶出去

translation.en: She might have just gone away if he'd left her alone.
translation.zh:
‎他要是没招惹我妈
‎我妈可能早就离开了

translation.en: Then maybe none of this would have happened.
-Don't scream, Anna. -[gasps]
That'll just be bad for everyone.
Take a deep breath.
That's what they're always telling me to do.
Self-management coping skills.
Good. We can breathe together.
translation.zh: ‎很好 我们可以一起深呼吸

translation.en: -Why are you so freaked out? -[shuddering]
You're killing yourself anyway, right?
translation.zh: ‎你本就打算自杀的 不是吗？

translation.en: No. No.
I thought it was a really nice video.
How did you get into my house?
'Cause you're so vigilant about your keys.
And sober. Right.
I've been in here all week.
You killed your mother.
That bothers you, right?
You feel for her?
You and Katie… one job to do.
One fucking thing.
Take care of your family, right?
Both of you.
And what do you do?
The real estate lady who sold my dad the house,
she talked about you and what happened.
translation.zh: ‎跟我们说起过你和你经历的事情

translation.en: And I couldn't stop thinking what a perfect next person you were for me.
translation.zh:
‎我就忍不住想
‎你多么适合做我的下一个目标

translation.en: I knew exactly what you would like.
Is that a talent or a skill… to know that…
in your professional opinion?
Okay, see? Now you don't like me anymore.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你看 这下你再也不喜欢我了

translation.en: Is that what happened in Boston
translation.zh:
‎波士顿也发生了这样的事吗？
‎你和帕米拉？

translation.en: with you and Pam? She got sick of you?
translation.zh:
‎波士顿也发生了这样的事吗？
‎你和帕米拉？ ‎她讨厌你了？

translation.en: Pam liked everything I did. You don't seem very sure about it.
translation.zh:
‎-我做什么 帕米拉都喜欢
‎-你听上去并不十分确信

translation.en: She was just a place to start.
I'm still figuring things out.
-What does that mean? -I don't have a pattern yet.
translation.zh:
‎-什么意思？
‎-我还没形成自己的手法

translation.en: -Pattern of? -Of this!
I have so many choices, right?
What do I wanna be when I grow up?
translation.zh: ‎长大后我想成为什么样的人？

translation.en: I know I like being there when it happens, feeling it.
translation.zh:
‎我知道 当我到了那个境界
‎我会喜欢的 好好感受

translation.en: Pam took about five minutes to die after she hit the ground.
translation.zh: ‎帕米拉坠楼后 花了五分钟才断气

translation.en: If you hadn't found that picture of Katie,
translation.zh: ‎要不是你找到了凯蒂的照片

translation.en: I was just gonna come in at the very end and say goodbye.
translation.zh: ‎我本只打算在你临死前进来道别

translation.en: You could pretend that I'm not even here.
I just wanna watch you go.
Okay.
You know what, fuck it.
You wanna watch?
Because a world with you in it…
where you exist…
is a world of filth.
No, I'm done.
I don't wanna breathe that air.
-[Ethan] Anna! -[gasping heavily]
Anna!
Stop fighting me!
-[gasps] -You don't even wanna live anymore!
You haven't wanted to live for a long time!
Here we go!
[Anna] No!
[Little] Hey.
Hey, I was just gonna leave a message.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我本打算留个言就走的

translation.en: Were you here before?
[Little] Yeah. And they, um… they told me not to wake you, so…
translation.zh:
‎是的 他们说让我不要吵醒你
‎所以…

translation.en: Are you in pain?
I should be, right?
Hey, just don't stay on that shit too long 'cause it feels way too good.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 别太依赖止痛药 ‎因为它会让你上瘾的

translation.en: David's dead?
Yeah.
I'm sorry.
But, uh, we have the Russells in custody.
translation.zh: ‎但是我们拘留了拉塞尔一家

translation.en: He isn't sayin' a word, but Jane, she won't stop talking, so… [scoffs]
translation.zh: ‎他一言不发 但是简说个不停 所以…

translation.en: We have Katherine Melli's body.
translation.zh: ‎我们找到了凯瑟琳梅利的尸体

translation.en: We found it in Fort Lee.
Means you were right about everything you saw.
translation.zh: ‎这证明你看到的一切都是真的

translation.en: And we messed up, and you're gonna get a lot of apologies from a lot of people.
translation.zh: ‎是我们弄错了 很多人都要跟你道歉

translation.en: And I just wanted to be here to be the first.
I'm sorry.
Thank you.
I saw your video.
So, look, um, Detective Norelli,
translation.zh: ‎所以 是这样 诺莱丽探员

translation.en: I hope you don't mind, she's got Punch at her house.
translation.zh:
‎希望你别介意
‎她把小拳头接回她家了

translation.en: Whenever you're ready to get out of here, she's happy to give her back--
translation.zh:
‎等你恢复好 可以出院后
‎她就会把猫给你送回去…

translation.en: So, everybody's seen the video?
At this point…
no.
No, no, no. Um…
We're actually having a little trouble locating the phone.
translation.zh: ‎其实我们在定位手机时遇到了点麻烦

translation.en: Yeah, I think that somehow the phone ended up here with you,
translation.zh:
‎是啊 不知怎么的
‎那部手机回到了你的手里

translation.en: and when I come back and ask you about it in an hour…
translation.zh: ‎我一小时后再来问你这件事…

translation.en: you hand it over.
Get rid of anything on there that you don't want out, okay?
translation.zh: ‎你可以删除不想公开的内容 好吗？

translation.en: Really?
Look, I messed up this case so bad already.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我已经把这件事给办砸了

translation.en: I don't think one more thing is gonna hurt me, right?
translation.zh: ‎再出点错也没什么大不了的 是吧？

translation.en: Just be straight up with me.
I'm not gonna have to worry about you, right?
Right.
I have to go now.
I miss you.
You ready?
-[meows] -All right.
Okay, it won't be long. -Come on, come on. Come. -[purrs]
translation.zh: ‎好的 不会很久的 进去

translation.en: Good boy.
